column5: Geronimo boathouse is a clean, comfortable, & conveniently located accommodation that lets you be on the water your entire trip. While fully equipped with all your basic modern conveniences, its ambience offers a unique experience. Just a 15 minutes drive to the ferry landing, island beaches, shopping, water craft rentals, bird watching, restaurants, & nightclubs. Fishing is 24/7 everywhere! Enjoy beautiful sunrises & breath-taking sunsets. NOTE: allow 48 hrs for host reply due to location
